Dialogue Text: Oh, I almost didn't notice you here.
Well since you're here. good timing!
A certain place has been on my mind for a while now after all.
Is that why you were lost in thought?
Do you know that feeling? When you're high up above?
For a moment it feels like your worries and troubles don't matter as much anymore...
Whenever I see water around me, I can't help but think about that place...
Was that place perhaps really high?
I guess this place must've meant a lot to you.
Definitely one of the highest structure you'll ever see here! Oh did I mention it has a hole somewhere too?
Of course it did! Now that I think about it, I used to look beyond the hole of the ceiling, thinking about what lies on the other side of the world...
You love being around water bodies?
Sure you bet! It was always fun watching as the water flowed downwards. I wonder where it goes...
That place was well known for its waterfall. The sound of it usually helped to calm my mind back then.
